conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric transformation with consistent wall thickness and isometric projection.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D geometry; walls are solid and clean with clear floor separation.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout; rooms, wall partitions, and window placements align almost perfectly with the 2D source.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is well-placed and scaled; kitchen island and bathroom fixtures match 2D symbology precisely.

visual_clarity.notes: Very clean render; high contrast between walls and floors. Points slightly deducted for generic blue window fills instead of transparency.

detected_errors.description: Minor simplification of door swings compared to the specific paths shown in 2D.

summary: An exceptional 3D conversion that maintains strict geometric fidelity to the original architectural floor plan.
